metadata.title: CVE-2016-6333 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the CSS user subpage previewfeature in MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.x before 1.26.4, and 1.27.xbefore 1.27.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the edit box in Special:MyPage/common.css.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
